testcase.classname: Feature to test the tp level menu are Home, Our Story, Our Solution, and Why Tendable.
testcase.name: Check all the menu button are working or not.
Check login with valid credential - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User on Tendable Home page............................................passed When click the Contact Us button............................................passed And Click the contact button which from Marketing tag.......................passed And User enter the full name Iniyan.........................................passed And User enter the Organisation TCS.........................................passed And User enter the Phone Number 823834998...................................passed And User enter the email id iniyan@gmail.com................................passed And User skip to enter the input on Message box.............................passed And User click the i agree button...........................................passed And User click submit button................................................passed Then user got error message because not enter the value on Messsage box.....passed
